Text: Hmmm - HUGE difference between pantyhose and stockings.  These are in fact pantyhose.  Stockings require the use of suspenders, or can be of the "hold-up" variety.  Either way, there is a significant amount of leg skin showing.  And no nylon over the arse or fanny.  "There's nothing sexy about a reinforced crotch" !
@pythonista - these are BODY stockings, and he used it correctly

I think one should always be perfectly clear about things like this.  If it's a body stocking, then he should say so.  However, I do appreciate the effort the uploader does, and especially that he provides snapshots/thumbnails.  I'm just fussy and pedantic.
 :-)
